skills.name: Spiral Close-In
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and then separately performs "$[K53]" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S30045]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S30046]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> and then separately performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>High-Frequency Whirling Assault</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Hyperspeed Whirling Assault</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Physical DMG and then separately performs "Prepare Skill" for High-Frequency Whirling Assault and Hyperspeed Whirling Assault.

skills.name: Suppressive Volley
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C130041]</color> in the opponent's play area.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Seeking Missile</color> in the opponent's play area.
skills.description: Deals 4 Physical DMG, creates 1 Seeking Missile in the opponent's play area.

skills.name: Standard Armor
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) The $[K100] this character receives is halved (Rounded up)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) The {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> this character receives is halved (Rounded up)
skills.description: (Passive) The Physical DMG this character receives is halved (Rounded up)

skills.name: High-Frequency Whirling Assault
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>. Then, perform "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Hyperspeed Whirling Assault</color>.
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 1 Physical DMG. Then, perform "Prepare Skill" for Hyperspeed Whirling Assault.

skills.name: Hyperspeed Whirling Assault
skills.descriptionraw: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. This character also gains 1 bonus Energy.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>. This character also gains 1 bonus Energy.
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 1 Physical DMG. This character also gains 1 bonus Energy.
